tooltips.analyzeCurrentData: Analyze current session notes, tasks and log with selected context
tooltips.pomodoroProgress: Completed {{completed}} of {{total}} pomodoros in this cycle.

aiSummaryDialog.title: AI Session Analysis
aiSummaryDialog.description: Here's a summary of your session and suggestions for improvement.

settingsDialog.title: Timer Settings
settingsDialog.description: Adjust your Pomodoro timer settings and preferences.
settingsDialog.showInitialGuideDescription: Display a helpful guided tour on first visit or if not completed.
settingsDialog.longBreakIntervalDescription: Number of work sessions before a long break.

userGuideDialog.title: RS Timer User Guide
userGuideDialog.description: Learn how to make the most of your focus sessions.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with Pomodoro
gettingStarted.content: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method that uses a timer to break work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks.\n{{appName}} Timer helps you implement this technique. Each work interval is a "Pomodoro." After a set number of Pomodoros (usually 4), you take a longer break.\nBenefits include improved focus, reduced burnout, and better time estimation.

timerControls.title: Timer Controls
timerControls.content:
Use these controls to manage your session:
* Start/Pause: Click the main button to start or pause the current timer (Work, Short Break, or Long Break).
* Skip: Click the skip button (icon with arrow pointing right) to end the current interval and move to the next one.
* Reset: Click the reset button (circular arrow icon) to reset the current interval to its full duration and pause the timer.
* Mute/Unmute: Toggle soundscapes on or off using the volume icon.

customization.title: Customization (Settings)
customization.content:
Click the gear icon in the header to open Settings. You can customize:
* Timer Durations: Set custom lengths for Work, Short Break, and Long Break intervals.
* Long Break Interval: Define how many work sessions occur before a long break.
* Auto-start: Enable/disable automatic starting of breaks and Pomodoros.
* Notifications: Toggle browser notifications for interval ends.
* Soundscapes & Animations: Choose different ambient sounds for work/break periods, and select visual background effects. Adjust master volume.
* Mouse Trail Effect: Enable or disable a particle effect that follows your mouse.
* Initial Guide: Toggle the helpful guided tour that appears on first visit.

collapsibleCards.title: Collapsible Sections
collapsibleCards.content: The 'Today's Tasks', 'Session Dictionary', and 'Session Notes & Context' sections below the timer are collapsible. Click on their titles to expand or hide them, helping you manage your workspace view.

tasksAndNotes.title: Tasks & Notes
tasksAndNotes.content:
Below the timer, you'll find sections for managing tasks and taking notes:
* Today's Tasks: Add tasks you want to accomplish during your focus sessions. Mark them as complete or delete them.
* Session Notes & Context: Use the textarea to jot down thoughts, distractions, or ideas that arise.
Your tasks and notes can be included in the AI Session Analysis.

sessionContext.title: Session Context
sessionContext.content: Before analyzing your session data (notes, tasks, or a full Pomodoro log), you can specify a "Session Context" (e.g., Work, Learning, General).\nThis helps the AI provide more tailored feedback and suggestions relevant to your current activity.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Session Analysis
aiAnalysis.content: {{appName}} Timer features an AI-powered session analyzer. Click the sparkles icon in the header or the "Analyze Data" button in the notes section.\nThe AI will review your completed intervals (if any), tasks, and notes for the current session, along with the selected Session Context.\nIt provides a summary and actionable suggestions for improvement. This is especially useful after a Long Break or when you've accumulated some notes/tasks.

chatWidget.title: AI Chat Assistant
chatWidget.content: Need quick help or a productivity tip? Click the chat icon in the bottom right corner to talk to our AI assistant.\nIt can answer questions about using {{appName}}, the Pomodoro Technique, or general focus strategies.

dictionaryCard.title: Session Dictionary
dictionaryCard.content: Use the Dictionary Card to get definitions for words in English and Indonesian during your session. These definitions are stored temporarily and can be exported to a Markdown file for your records.

sessionHistory.title: Session History
sessionHistory.content: Click the history icon (clock with arrow) in the header to view a log of your completed Pomodoro intervals.\nThis helps you track your focus sessions over time. You can also clear the history from this panel.

themeAndAppearance.title: Theme & Appearance
themeAndAppearance.content: * Dark/Light Mode: Toggle between dark and light themes using the sun/moon icon in the header.\n* Background Effects: Choose various animated backgrounds or a simple gradient in the Settings menu to personalize your focus environment.

interactiveTourDialog.welcomeContent: {{appName}} is a Pomodoro timer designed to boost your focus and productivity. This quick tour will show you around.
interactiveTourDialog.timerContent: This is your main countdown timer. It switches between Work, Short Break, and Long Break modes automatically or manually.
interactiveTourDialog.timerControlsContent: Use these buttons to Start/Pause, Skip to the next interval, Reset the current interval, or Mute/Unmute sounds.
interactiveTourDialog.pomodoroDotsContent: These dots track your progress through a Pomodoro cycle. A full cycle (usually 4 work sessions) earns you a Long Break.
interactiveTourDialog.collapsibleCardsContent: The sections for Tasks, Dictionary, and Notes below the timer can be expanded or collapsed by clicking their titles.
interactiveTourDialog.tasksContent: Add your to-dos here for the current session. Mark them complete as you go. Tasks can be included in the AI Analysis.
interactiveTourDialog.notesContent: Jot down thoughts or distractions here. Select a 'Session Context' (Work, Learning, General) to help the AI give more relevant feedback.
interactiveTourDialog.aiAnalysisContent: After a session or when you have notes/tasks, click the Sparkles icon (‚ú®) in the header or 'Analyze Data' button to get an AI summary and improvement tips.
interactiveTourDialog.chatWidgetContent: Click the chat icon in the bottom right to talk to an AI assistant for quick questions or support related to your focus session.
interactiveTourDialog.dictionaryCardContent: Define words in English and Indonesian. Your session's definitions can be exported to Markdown.
interactiveTourDialog.headerToolsContent: Access AI Summary (‚ú®), Session History (üïí), User Guide (üìñ), Settings (‚öôÔ∏è), Theme Toggle (‚òÄÔ∏è/üåô), and Language Switcher (üåê) from the header.
interactiveTourDialog.settingsContent: Customize timer durations, auto-start behavior, sounds, background animations, and more to fit your workflow.
interactiveTourDialog.allSetContent: You've learned the basics of {{appName}}. Time to start your first focus session!

dictionaryCard.title: Session Dictionary
dictionaryCard.description: Define words and store them for your current session. Export to Markdown anytime.
dictionaryCard.errorDefiningDescription: Could not get definitions for the word. Please try again.
dictionaryCard.nothingToExport: No words defined yet in this session.
dictionaryCard.exportSuccessfulDescription: Your dictionary session has been downloaded as a Markdown file.
